# Organizational Risk Acceptance Review

## System and Risk Overview
Describe the AI system and the known operational risks.

---

## Risk Severity and Exposure
Evaluate the potential impact and likelihood of those risks.

---

## Accountability Implications
Explain who is accountable if accepted risks cause harm.

---

## Risk Acceptance Decision
State clearly whether the risks are accepted or rejected.

---

## Decision Defensibility
Explain whether this decision would remain defensible after failure.
